mooc-section-learning-goals-title: Title of the learning goals section.
mooc-section-learning-goals-edit-title: Title of the button to edit the learning goals.
mooc-section-video-edit-title: Title of the button to change the video.
mooc-section-script-edit-title: Title of the button to edit the script.
mooc-section-quiz-edit-title: Title of the button to edit the quiz.
mooc-section-further-reading-title: Title of the further reading section.
mooc-section-further-reading-edit-title: Title of the button to edit the further reading items.
mooc-section-units-edit-title: Title of the button to edit the units.
mooc-section-units-add-title: Title of the button to add an unit.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-video: Title of the link to the unit's video section.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-download-vi: Title of the link to download the unit's video.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-script: Title of the link to the unit's script section.
mooc-section-units-unit-link-quiz: Title of the link to the unit's quiz section.
mooc-unit-no-video: Alternative text for the thumbnail of a unit when no video is available.
mooc-section-lessons-add-title: Title of the button to add a lesson.
mooc-lesson-add-unit-summary: Edit summary when adding an unit to a lesson. Parameters: 1. unit name
mooc-overview-add-lesson-summary: Edit summary when adding a lesson to a MOOC. Parameters: 1. lesson name
mooc-modal-button-title-save: Label of the button to save the changes made in the modal box.
mooc-modal-button-title-add: Label of the button to add the item specified in the modal box.
mooc-modal-button-title-cancel: Label of the button to close the modal box and cancel the current action.
mooc-modal-button-title-reset: Label of the button to reset the modal box to the values stored in the MOOC item.
mooc-section-learning-goals-empty-descri: Placeholder shown when the learning goals section is empty.
mooc-section-learning-goals-empty-edit-l: Text of the link to encourage viewers to define a learning goal.
mooc-section-video-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the video section is empty.
mooc-section-video-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to define the video.
mooc-section-script-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the script section is empty.
mooc-section-script-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to create the script.
mooc-section-quiz-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the quiz section is empty.
mooc-section-quiz-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to create the quiz.
mooc-section-further-reading-empty-descr: Placeholder shown when the further reading section is empty.
mooc-section-further-reading-empty-edit-: Text of the link to encourage viewers to define a further reading resource.
mooc-section-lessons-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the lessons section is empty.
mooc-section-lessons-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to add lessons.
mooc-section-units-empty-description: Placeholder shown when the units section is empty.
mooc-section-units-empty-edit-link: Text of the link to encourage viewers to add units.
mooc-button-expand-section: Label of the button that expands the section.
mooc-overview-add-lesson-modal-placehold: Placeholder of the control to enter the name of a lesson that's being created.
mooc-lesson-add-unit-modal-placeholder-n: Placeholder of the control to enter the name of an unit that's being created.
mooc-unit-edit-learning-goals-modal-plac: Placeholder of the control to enter a new learning goal for the unit that's being edited.
mooc-unit-edit-video-modal-placeholder-v: Placeholder of the control to enter a video file name for the unit that's being edited.
mooc-unit-edit-script-modal-placeholder-: Placeholder of the control to enter the script for the unit that's being edited.
mooc-unit-edit-quiz-modal-placeholder-va: Placeholder of the control to enter the quiz for the unit that's being edited.
mooc-unit-edit-further-reading-modal-pla: Placeholder of the control to enter a new further reading for the unit that's being edited.
